title: 820-00165 no green light PPBUS_G3H 0.5V SMC is hot. no signs of any damage
message: this just came in today, not really keen on changing the smc but its probs cooked by now. I'm getting PPDCIN_G3H PP3V42_G3H is 2.35V

title: 820-00165 no green light PPBUS_G3H 0.5V SMC is hot. no signs of any damage
message: PPBUS_G3H is not constant. it drops out to 0.007V after about 30-60 seconds

title: 820-00165 no green light PPBUS_G3H 0.5V SMC is hot. no signs of any damage
message:
Such low voltage on 3V42 and hot SMC point to dead SMC.
Remove SMC and get correct 3V42 first.
Also must get 8.2V at F7140; before solder new SMC.

title: 820-00165 no green light PPBUS_G3H 0.5V SMC is hot. no signs of any damage
message: Check for a short on PP3v42. Inspect all components near the SMC.
